author: veithen
msg: Merged r816804 (Reduced the dependencies in the integration tests to direct dependencies on other Axis2 artifacts. This makes sure that the classpath used by the tests is similar to what a user would get. This should allow us to detect dependency issues more easily.) to the 1.5 branch.
